name: Idle Picker! [15th March 2022]
description:
Welcome to Idle Picker! Ever wanted to just break a lotta blocks while also upgrading your gear and unlocking new areas, until you eventually unlock exploration? Well then find a game with quality Then you're at the right place!

----- BLOCK COMPRESSION DOES NOT WORK YET, THIS WILL BE FIXED NEXT WEEK -----

Latest update:

1.0-pre1 (4th February 2022):

-Sound Effects

-New UI

-66 new blocks

-6 new dimensions

-New achievements

-Multi block breaking

-Stats save

-Version number shows

-Optimized data

-a lot of bug fixes

AND SO MUCH MORE!

(please know that the "Waterperson", "Collector", "Area Unlocker", "Caveman" and "Ultimate Collector" achievements are not functional yet, that will be fixed next week)

This game is heavily inspired by 'Pickcrafter' but will have unique aspects.

Everything, except for the idea, is made by me, 08Schlaukopf08.
